message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth the investment for you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in making a deal, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 simply doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to meet you halfway. This is a fair price considering the value this product brings. Let's make this happen!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $9,800, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in making a deal, but I need to make sure it's a good value for me.

Bob, I'm trying to be reasonable here, but $9,800 is still too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more to $10,000, which is still a good value for you.  If this doesn't work for you, I'll have to move on to other buyers.

I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice, and I'm glad to hear that $10,000 is the lowest you're willing to go. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but I'd like to throw in a request: can you throw in some additional support or warranty with the product to make it an even better value for me? If so, I'd be willing to meet you at $10,000.
